title: MM怪做的狼会被骨头驯服
author: yan1095507221
txt_content:
MM怪做的狼会被骨头驯服

怎么办

replies.author: MC_Shenfeng
replies.txt_content:
yw1:
  Mobtype: Wolf
  Display: '&exxxx'
  Health: 15
  Damage: 1
  Equipment:
  Drops:
  - lpgjx 1-2 0.5
  - gr 1-2 0.8 
  - exp 2
  - money 2-3
  Options:
    AlwaysShowName: true
    MovementSpeed: 0.2
    PreventOtherDrops: true
    Tameable: false
加个最后一行
Tameable: false
就行
如有帮助望采纳
